  • Constructor Details

    • CameraIntrinsicParameters

      public CameraIntrinsicParameters(double[][] k)

    • CameraIntrinsicParameters

      public CameraIntrinsicParameters(double[][] k, double[] radial, boolean useR2R4)
      Parameters:
      k -
      radial - the radialDistortion to set
      useR2R4 - use radial distortion function from Ma et al. 2004 for model #4 in Table 2, f(r) = 1 +k1*r^2 + k2*r^4 if true, else use model #3 f(r) = 1 +k1*r + k2*r^2.

      public CameraIntrinsicParameters()
